data.text: @nolamaven @nolaready He said I have these two children from a previous marriage. He denied having others. Upon remarriage for a 4th quarter, his oldest daughter, the one he denied having, died in a sudden car wreck with an truck. I know this because Chevron Oil executives & I are tight.

@nolamaven @nolaready I took a pregnancy test once w Capt Tony who worked for an independent contractor of Chevron Oil. He felt like a liar. I felt terrible one morning like a mickie was in a drink. He denied. Thank GOD the test was negative. I don’t remember if he went inside, but he don’t count.
@BienvilleBlake @nolamaven @nolaready Would you prefer we act stupid and have them raging again?

@nolamaven @nolaready Why? Would I take a COVID when I have never taken a pregnancy test and I have never taken an STD test. I have never had the chicken pox, measles or mumps. I have stopped breathing 2 many times to count. I got the vaccine and I believe in J&J. They were number 3. Wuaaaah, Wuaaaah
